```{r message = F}
if(params$modality == "scRNASeq"){
  fig_width = 12
  fig_height = 10
}else{
  fig_width = 7
  fig_height = 7
}

markers <- read_yaml(params$markers)$cell_types %>% 
  unlist() %>% unique()

rename_cd16 <- which(markers == "CD16-32")
if(length(rename_cd16) == 1){
  markers[rename_cd16] <- "CD16_32"
}

random_files <- list.files(params$random_files_path, full.names = TRUE)
random <- lapply(random_files, read_tsv) %>%  
  bind_rows() %>% 
  mutate(set = as.character(set))
head(random)

seurat_files <- list.files(params$seurat_files_path, full.names = TRUE)
Seurat <- lapply(seurat_files, read_tsv) %>%  
  bind_rows() %>% 
  dplyr::rename("set" = "params") %>% 
  mutate(set = as.character(set))
head(Seurat)

AL_files <- list.files(params$AL_files_path, full.names = TRUE)
AL <- lapply(AL_files, read_tsv) %>% 
  bind_rows()

sce <- readRDS(params$sce)
dataset <- tibble(cell_id = colnames(sce),
                  gt_cell_type = sce$CellType)
```


```{r fig.width = 10, fig.height = 7}
random_count <- random %>%

AL_count <- AL %>%

  tally() %>% 
  mutate(selection = "Active-Learning")

  mutate(method = gsub("Active-Learning-groundTruth-strategy-", "", method)) %>%

  whatsthatcell_theme() + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1, vjust = 1))

dataset_frequencies <- dataset %>% 
  group_by(gt_cell_type) %>%

dataset_frequencies %>%

  scale_fill_manual(values = cell_type_colours()) +
```

# Heatmaps

## AL selection 

```{r fig.width= fig_width, fig.height=fig_height}
if(any(grepl("CellType", colnames(colData(sce))))){
  cell_type_column <- "CellType"
}else{
  cell_type_column <- "cell_type"
}

expression_heatmap <- function(sce, df, selection_method, params){
  sub_sce <- sce[markers, colnames(sce) %in% df$cell_id]
  createHeatmap(sub_sce, 
              cell_type_column = cell_type_column, 
              title = paste(selection_method, '\n', params))
  
}

AL <- AL %>% 
  mutate(method = gsub("Active-Learning-groundTruth-strategy-", "", method)) %>% 
  separate(method, into = c('strategy', 'r', 'random', 'c', 'corrupted'), sep = '-') %>% 
  select(-c(r, c))

lapply(unique(AL$strategy), function(strat){
  lapply(unique(AL$random), function(rand){
    lapply(unique(AL$corrupted), function(corrupted){
      lapply(unique(AL$cell_num), function(cell_num){
        df <- filter(AL, 
                     strategy == strat,
                     random == rand,
                     corrupted == corrupted,
                     cell_num == cell_num)
        
        print(paste0('Strategy-', strat, '-random-', rand, '\ncorrupted-', corrupted, '-cell_num-', cell_num))
        
        expression_heatmap(sce, df, 'Active-Learning',
                           paste0('Strategy-', strat, '-random-', rand, '\ncorrupted-', corrupted, '-cell_num-', cell_num))
      })
    })
  })
})
```


## Random selection 

```{r fig.width=fig_width, fig.height=fig_height}
random <- random %>% 
  separate(params, into = c("num", "cell_num", 'cor', 'corruption'), sep = '-')

lapply(unique(random$set), function(set){
  lapply(unique(random$corruption), function(corrupt){
    lapply(unique(random$cell_num), function(cell_num){
        df <- filter(random, 
                     set == set,
                     corruption == corrupt,
                     cell_num == cell_num)
        
        print(paste0(set, '-corrupted-', corrupt, '-cell_num-', cell_num))
        
        expression_heatmap(sce, df, 'Random',
                           paste0(set, '-corrupted-', corrupt, '-cell_num-', cell_num))
    })
  })
})

filter(random, set == "Set1", corruption == "0", cell_num == "100") %>% 
  expression_heatmap(sce, ., "test1", 'test2')
```


## Seurat selection

```{r fig.height=fig_height, fig.width=fig_width}
Seurat <- Seurat %>% 
  mutate(set = gsub("cell", "", set)) %>% 
  separate(set, into = c("knn", 'knn_val', 'res', 'res_val', 'num', 'num_val', 'cor', 'corruption'), sep = '-')

lapply(unique(Seurat$knn_val), function(nearest_n){
  lapply(unique(Seurat$res_val), function(knn_resolution){
    lapply(unique(Seurat$corruption), function(corrupt){
      lapply(unique(Seurat$num_val), function(num_cell){
        df <- filter(Seurat, 
                     knn_val == nearest_n,
                     res_val == knn_resolution,
                     corruption == corrupt,
                     num_val == num_cell)
        
       paste0('knn-', nearest_n, '-res-', knn_resolution, '-corrupted-', corrupt, '-cell_num-', num_cell)
       
        expression_heatmap(sce, df, 'Seurat',
                          paste0('knn-', nearest_n, '-res-', knn_resolution, '\ncorrupted-', corrupt, '-cell_num-', num_cell))
      })
    })
  })
})
```
